entry.title: 'Pilot,' 'Despicable Me 4' and other movies to see in cinemas
entry.content: Pilot (12) Comedy / 111 mins. / Korean / July 31 How does one survive a tanked career? With cross-dressing. Life is extraordinary for Han Jung-Woo, played by Cho Jung-seok.
